text: Euryale, the legendary witch.
She had lost both arms due to a curse of the old gods, but in their place, she was able to freely control two giant swords with a magic spell called "Invisible Hand"ー
And we got to experience her fierce strength firsthand.

name: Kirara
text: Kyaaaaaaah!!!

name: Me
text: Kirara-senpai!?

name: Euryale
text: ーHoldest thou concern for others in thy heart, human?

name: Me
text: (Wh-When did sheー!!?)
*Clang!!*

name: Me
text: Urrrghh!!
Unable to completely withstand the hurtling sweep of her giant sword, I was thrown back violently.
ーI couldn't read her movements at all.
Like a gracefully dancing ballerina,
Euryale swung her two giant swords with ease and toyed with us.

name: Kirara
text: Y-You monster...
Kirara-senpai, who had been thrown back at the same time as me, grunted in frustration.
Her body was covered with countless wounds carved by the two giant swords.
They were not fatal, but without the stamina of the Oni, she surely would have been unable to fight.

name: Euryale
text: Hehe... As I recall, thou art the daughter of a Kijin. How mournful thy mother's blood must be at this sight.

name: Kirara
text: Ugh!! What's your problem, you stupid witch!? I'm just getting warmed uuuuuuuuup!!!
Kirara-senpai stood up with determination.
This was in spite of the fact that she surely had not fully recovered from the damage she had incurred during the battle with Yaemon yet.
She froze several of her open wounds to stop the bleeding and tried to confront the witch again.
ーBut I grabbed her shoulder and stopped her.

name: Me
text: Please wait!! Kirara-senpaiー We're gonna lose if we keep fighting like this!!

name: Kirara
text: Huh!!? Wh-What are you talking about all of a sudden!?
Kirara-senpai looked puzzled.
I got closer and whispered in her ear so that the witch couldn't hear.

name: Me
text: (She's targeting your weakness. That's why we can't win!)

name: Kirara
text: (M-My weaknessー!?)

name: Me
text: (Yes... The opening in the brief moment when you charge your cold air.)
Kirara-senpai had to perform an action in order to charge her ability to control cold air.
Of course, it was just a tiny fraction of time that couldn't even be called an opening.
There was no way it would have any effect on a battle.
ーAs long as the opponent was not a genuine monster like Euryale.

name: Euryale
text: Hehe...
Euryale looked down on us with a cheerful smile, not even attacking us while we remained stationary.

name: Me
text: (Of course that's how it is...)
I confirmed that fact and continued to whisper in Kirara-senpai's ear.

name: Me
text: (...She's totally targeting it.)

name: Me
text: (A normal opponent couldn't possibly be able to target the moment you charge your cold air. Butー)
That was not the case for Euryale.
She was thwarting Kirara's power of cold air with the help of her astonishing speed and her vision that seemed to see through all of our movements.
Or to think about it from the opposite angleー
Kirara's power to control cold air was so threatening that even the legendary witch was relentlessly vigilant against it.

name: Kirara
text: (I-I mean, even Iー)

name: Me
text: (Senpai...?)
As she glared at the enigmatically smiling Euryale, Kirara-senpai grumbled in annoyance.

name: Kirara
text: (I knew that, you know! That I can't move as well as I'd like, and that I'm getting interrupted before I can even attackー)

name: Kirara
text: (But even then!! There's nothing else I can do!! I can only fight with this powerー)

name: Me
text: (ーThere is something else. Your Taimanin Jutsu.)
I made an effort to whisper calmly.
Asking her about her Ninja Art back in the grassland, while knowing she wouldn't like it, had been for times like this.
To be able to give the correct commands, you have to know exactly what the members of your team are capable of.

name: Kirara
text: (My Taimanin Jutsu...)

name: Me
text: (Yes. With the Jutsu you told me about back then, we have a chance to win.)
I knew that Kirara-senpai was not happy about this.
She had said that she wouldn't use her Taimanin Jutsu ever again.
Because she had inherited her Ninja Art from her despicable father, who had slain her beloved mother.
Even so, I appealed to her.

name: Me
text: (Please use your Ninja Art. ーI'll issue the commands.)
I could sense the gaze of Kirara-senpai's striking eyes on the side of my face as she turned toward me.
But I didn't react.
I simply faced forward and stared fixedly at the bewitchingly smiling Euryale.

name: Kirara
text: (I'll lose...?)

name: Me
text: (If we keep going like this, yes)

name: Kirara
text: (But if I do as you say, we can win.)

name: Me
text: (Yes. Will you follow my orders?)
There was no conclusive proof of anything.
But taking on responsibility was also the role of the commander.

name: Kirara
text: (Alright, got it. I'llーtrust you.)

name: Me
text: (Thank you!!)
ーWe were good to go.
I whispered to Kirara-senpai the plan I had mulled over in my head repeatedly.

name: Euryale
text: Hehe... Didst thou settle on a strategy?

name: Me
text: Yeah. Sorry to keep you waiting.
Kirara-senpai and I stood side by side and faced Euryale, who was floating eerily.
...She was a woman whose true motives were inscrutable.
I thought that she would suddenly attack us, but she had refrained from doing so until our plan had been finalized.

name: Me
text: (If my guess is correct, then our "negotiations" are still ongoing.)
Rather, this battle itself was a negotiationー
That was why we needed to defeat this witch at all costs.

name: Euryale
text: Well then, let us see how much delectation the floundering of weaklings can grant meー

name: Me
text: Haha, don't be too afraid when you actually see us in action!! ーLet's do this, Kirara-senpai!!!

name: Kirara
text: Yes, Fuma!!
Kirara-senpai was the first to move.

name: Kirara
text: Prepare yourself, you snide, gloomy witch!! Haaaaaaaaー!!!
Keeping a sufficient distance from Euryale, she charged her cold air.

name: Euryale
text: Hehe. I see no improvement...
The witch drew closer to prevent her from doing so, swinging down her giant sword with godlike speed. And thereー
Moving a short moment after the witch, I slashed at her from behind with my ninjato.
Euryale's battle movements were unpredictable and bizarre.
But it was possible to predict that she would come after Kirara-senpai charging her cold airーMy surprise attack targeted that.
However.

name: Euryale
text: Well, well? This isー
*Clang!!!!*

name: Me
text: Uargh!?
The ninjato I held was sent flying.
She had easily swung her second sword and quickly dealt with my attack.

name: Kirara
text: F-Fuma!?
Kirara-senpai screamed.
But she was the one who was truly in danger.

name: Euryale
text: Thy strategy is no more than mere child's play!!
The witch's giant sword came swinging down.
Right toward Kirara-senpai's body, defenseless while charging up the coldness.

name: Kirara
text: Ugghhh～～～～!!!
Sinking deep inー
Kirara-senpai's body was cut from her right shoulder to her abdomen, and fresh blood gushed out.

name: Euryale
text: Hehe, how easy... In the end, thou wert nothing more than this?
The witch scoffed.
The daughter of the Kijin, who had posed a threat, had fallen.
There was only a powerless man left.
They no longer had any way to resist. Butー
This had also all been part of my plan.

name: Euryale
text: !? Thou artー!?
Collapsed on the ground with her body torn open, Kirara-senpai grinned broadly.
And slowly her appearance changed.
No, that was not Kirara-senpai.
ーIt was "me."

name: Me
text: ...Hehe, are you surprised? Apparently, this Ninja Art is called Substitution Jutsu.
I laughed while spilling blood from my mouth.
The Jutsu was lifted from "my" body, which had been cleaved by the giant sword, and my actual body returned.
By touching another person and activating the Ninja Art, the two people's bodies completely switched, including their voices and appearances.
That was the Ninja Art that Kirara-senpai had inherited from her father.

name: Euryale
text: ーThen that means...!?
The witch turned around.
Exactlyー If I was here...
Then the idiotic "me," whose ninjato had gotten repelled earlierー

name: Kirara
text: ーSuper Freeze!!
Kirara-senpai shouted loudly as her cold air charge completed.
The power of the Kijin that she had inherited from her motherーKirara-senpai swung her leg, charged with that power, powerfully down to the ground.

name: Euryale
text: Aaaarrgh!!
In an instant, an enormous ice pillar rose upー
Trapped within it, the witch was frozen, her face contorted in a hideous manner.
Thenー

name: Kirara
text: Special Attack: Go With the Floe!!!!
*Craaaaack!!*
Shards of ice scattered across the desolate wilderness.
Both of her arms charged with cold air, Kirara-senpai shattered the whole ice pillar and smashed the witch to pieces.

name: Kirara
text: Haah, haah...! How did you like that, you wreeeeeeetch!?
With her fists still in her follow-through pose, Kirara-senpai roared out in triumph after our battle with the witch.

name: Me
text: (Haha, Kirara-senpai really is incredible...)
I watched her, holding my stomach that had been slashed open, still gushing blood.
It had been a bit of a painful experience for me, but it was worth it if that was all I had to doー
Hehe... Well, I guess you barely passed.
The sound of clapping came from behind me.
And when I turned around, the woman in the Taimanin suit was standing there.

name: Me
text: E-Euryale...?

name: Euryale
text: Yes, little Fuma. It was a delightful time fighting you♪
The witch smiled.
She spoke in a gentle and charming tone, completely different from earlier...

name: Kirara
text: Ehhh!? Wh-What...!? Ugh... V-Very well, if you want to have another round...
ー*Thud!!*

name: Kirara
text: F-Fuma!?
...As expected, my wounds had been too deep.
I couldn't stand anymore and collapsed on the spot.

name: Kirara
text: W-Wait!!? What am I supposed to do!? That woman is still aliveー

name: Kirara
text: And you're hurt this badly, Fumaー Aaah!? You're okay, right!? You're not gonna die, are you!?
Kirara-senpai ran over to me and touched my wound with a tearful look on her face.
She must have been stopping the bleeding, as the surface of my wound was starting to freeze.

name: Me
text: I-I'm okay... I mean, I'll recover...
I forced myself to smile to at least put Kirara-senpai at ease.

name: Kirara
text: B-But...!? It still hurts, doesn't it!?

name: Kirara
text: You're always too reckless... I-If you'd die because of this, I...

name: Euryale
text: ーHmm. Just a tiny bit deeper and I would have cut through his heart. That was some nice swordplay if I say so myself.

name: Kirara
text: !? This woman is shamelessー
Before I knew it, the woman was peering at my wound with amusement.
Kirara-senpai was furious, butー
The witch smoothly stepped past her and lightly touched my wound.

name: Kirara
text: Wh-What are you doing!? If you lay even one finger on Fuma, I'llー

name: Euryale
text: Hehe. Calm down, Oni-girl. I just treated him♪

name: Kirara
text: Huh!?
Was that... really a treatment?
Something looking like the bud of a plant quickly sprouted out of the wound in my chest where the witch had touched me.

name: Kirara
text: ー!? Fuma!?
That bud soon sprouted young leaves which covered the wound in my chestーand eventually the wound underneath them gradually disappeared.

name: Me
text: (So this is healing magic...)
But I had never seen such an advanced technique, even in books.
This was... the power of the "legendary witch" Euryale.

name: Kirara
text: I-It healed...? Fuma... are you already okay...?

name: Me
text: Yeah... looks like I am. Thank you, senpai.
I borrowed Kirara-senpai's shoulder to help me stand up.
At the same time as my wound disappeared, the young leaves growing on it also withered away and fell off.
Not only had my wound healed, but my body felt light.
My whole body was filled with a mysterious energy.

name: Me
text: ...Euryale. Does this mean we have "reached an agreement?"

name: Euryale
text: Ohoho♪ Yes. Personally, I would say you've "overcome the witch's trial."

name: Me
text: Haha, I see.
Well, I guess the meaning was the same.

name: Kirara
text: Eh? Wh-What...? What are you two talking about...?
Kirara-senpai looked between me and the witch with a face that said she didn't understand what was going on at all.

name: Me
text: No, I mean... It's not like I completely understood everything, but...
I said as a preface and then spoke to Kirara-senpai.

name: Me
text: To sum it up... this person has been playing with us.

name: Kirara
text: What!? P-Playingー
ーEuryale, the legendary witch.
Among the tales that she had written, there was one called "The Witch of Death's Knoll."
And the witch in that tale put the warrior who came to her seeking help through a "trial"ー

name: Me
text: Everything up until this point was her acting out a scene.

name: Me
text: Well, I did think that she was speaking in a strange and old-fashioned way, but...

name: Euryale
text: Oh my? Little Fuma, you're quite harsh♪
The witch said with a charming smile.
In the end, I supposed this easygoing demeanor was her "true" self.

name: Me
text: (Man, but stillー)
I sighed and looked at the desolate wilderness surrounding me.
How enormous must the power required to maintain such a vast magic space have been?
And this woman was doing this just to "play."
Uncontrollable tricksterー The absurdity of it all would explain her nickname.

name: Kirara
text: W-Wait a second!!? Playing!? ーQuit being ridiculous!!

name: Me
text: Kirara-senpai...?

name: Kirara
text: Then what!? Are you saying she killed them just for fun!?

name: Kirara
text: She killed Hebiko-chan and Shikanosuke-kun!! And the Taimanin unit!!! I will never forgive such crueー

name: Euryale
text: Ohoho♪ I couldn't be so boorish as to do that, could I?
*Crackー!!*

name: Kirara
text: Wh-What!?
In an instant, the scenery had changed.
From the desolate wilderness to a luxurious room you might find in a noble's mansion.

name: Euryale
text: A gift for the warrior that overcame the "trial"ーJust over there♪
The witch pointed to a corner of the room. And thereー

name: Shikanosuke
text: ZzZz... Mom, grab me the remote control...

name: Hebiko
text: *Mumble, mumble...* Hebiko is full already...
Kirara-senpai's mouth fell open upon seeing the two of them sleeping peacefully.
And close to them, all the members of the missing Taimanin unit were also sleeping.

name: Me
text: (Well... Of course they'd be.)
Euryale was an irrational being, but she did not kill without a reason.
I had learned of her nature from reading books and research papers about herー
And that was why I had not been seized with anger or despair, even seeing that pile of dead bodies.

name: Me
text: (That being said, we wouldn't have known of this if we had "failed" the trial...)
She did not slaughter meaninglessly.
But if there was some reason to it, doing so without hesitation was what it meant to be a witch...

name: Me
text: ーSo, what did you need from me?
This room must have been something like her living room.
I asked the elegantly lounging Euryale.

name: Euryale
text: Ohoho. I won't tell you that. I'm done with you already♪

name: Me
text: Huh? You're done? ...Does that mean you already did something?
The witch had said that she had caused this incident in order to meet me.
And yet... she didn't need me anymore?

name: Euryale
text: It's a s～e～c～r～e～t♪ But don't worry. I will tell you when the time comes.
Before I knew it, there was a glass filled with something looking like wine in the witch's hand.
And there were also glasses on the table in front of me and Kirara-senpai.

name: Me
text: Does it... have anything to do with the "lost arms" you've continued searching for?
I was a fan of hers so I knew about them.
It was said that Euryale had been wandering in search of them since ancient times...

name: Euryale
text: A secret is a secret. No one likes unrelenting children, boy.

name: Me
text: ...I see. Then it can't be helped.
In any case, she was not the kind of person you could coax an answer out of.
If she wanted to "wait for the right time"ーthen all I could do was wait patiently.

name: Me
text: In return... or maybe that's not the right way to put it, but I'd like to ask you a favor.

name: Euryale
text: Oh? What is it?♪

name: Me
text: Please leave this city. Someone like you being here upsets the balance in the underworld.
Especially since this woman also seemed to have made contact with the Nisha Clan.
If by any chance she were to ally herself with Gaiza, things would get out of hand.

name: Kirara
text: W-Waitー!!? There's no way this strange woman would obediently listen to your request!!

name: Me
text: Ah, Kirara-senpai.
Kirara-senpai, who seemed to have finally come back to her senses, spoke with a terribly threatening tone.

name: Kirara
text: Be careful, Fuma!! I bet she's going to cast some weird spell again, or demand some outrageous conditionsー

name: Euryale
text: Very well. I will go back to Amidahara tonight.

name: Kirara
text: Eeeeeehhhhhhhhhhh!?
Kirara-senpai's mouth fell open again.

name: Me
text: No, the thing is... she already did what she wanted to do.

name: Kirara
text: Wh-What she wanted to do...?

name: Me
text: The reason she came to Tokyo Kingdom, and also the reason why she kidnapped the Taimanin unitー

name: Me
text: Apparently, all of this was just the "fate" she created to meet me...
And once she had done that, there was no longer a need for her to be in the city.

name: Kirara
text: I don't get it...! Sh-She's... just causing inconveniences for other people!!!

name: Me
text: Well, yeah... That's a "witch" for you.

name: Euryale
text: Ehehe♪ Sorry, Kirara-chan☆

name: Kirara
text: ～～～～～!!? I really hate witches!!
Kirara-senpai declared resolutely.
Well, it was said that Oni and witches have had poor relations since ancient times, so I guess this was inevitable.

name: Euryale
text: ーWell then, little Fuma.
And once again, before I knew itーthe witch had come close enough for me to be able to feel her breath.

name: Euryale
text: In the near futureーyou will definitely cross paths with something "demonic."

name: Me
text: Demonic...? What's that, a prophecy?
The power of demons that had lain dormant within me, and the "Demonic Fate" she had spoken aboutー

name: Euryale
text: Who can say...? But you can always come see me if you ever need help.

name: Euryale
text: ーAmidahara. I'm always watching over you from thereー

name: Me
text: Hmm!? What are youー?
With a whisper, the witch's face came closer. And then her entrancing tongue slipped between my lipsー

name: Kirara
text: Aahhhhhhhhhhhhh～!!??

name: Euryale
text: ーPhew, that was good☆ You too, Kirara-chan, let's meet again♪
After giving me a passionate kiss, Euryale the witch disappeared from the room.

name: Me
text: Phew... That woman was really over the top...

name: Kirara
text: F-Fuma～～～!? Why are you wiping your lips so calmly!?

name: Me
text: Ah. It's alright, senpai. I was also a bit surprised, but there doesn't seem to be any magical significance to that kiss.
I nodded in an attempt to reassure Kirara-senpai.
I had thought that she might have put a curse on me, but the kiss didn't seem to have that kind of effect.

name: Kirara
text: That's not what I meant!

name: Me
text: Uh huh...

name: Kirara
text: And that makes it even worse, doesn't it!? If there was no magical significance to it, then what significance was there to it!?

name: Me
text: Yeah, I don't know.

name: Kirara
text: Ughhhhh, what's wrong with that woman!? I hate her!! I really hate witches!!

name: Kirara
text: I'll definitely freeze her the next time we meet!!!
Kirara-senpai's bellows echoed through the room.
As if in response, the surrounding landscape melted awayーand little by little, it transformed back into the original warehouse.
